welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Glencoe, where the stunning landscapes and small-town charm await you. Get ready to immerse yourself in outdoor adventures, friendly locals, and discover the hidden gems of this charming city!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Pal-Waukee Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: The private jet terminal at Pal-Waukee Airport caters to private and corporate aircraft.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: This terminal primarily serves United Airlines and its Star Alliance partners.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal serves Delta Air Lines and its SkyTeam partners.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: This terminal serves American Airlines and its Oneworld partners.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: This terminal serves international flights from various airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Memorial Airport is the primary hub for all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Memorial Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
